body:
To anybody who would like to review this: :bowing_man: 

Any suggestion related to content, phrasing, spelling, layout, ...., is welcome!

You can view the documentation locally by fetching this PR and:
```console
$ cd lib/spack/docs
$ make
$ <your-favorite-browser> _build/html/index.html
```

##### Modifications
The list of modifications here includes:
- [x] The addition of a brief introductory section on module files
- [x] The addition of a subsection on the overall architecture of module files
- [x] The preparation of a docker image to ease the set-up (thanks @ax3l)
- [x] Reference properly #5582
- [x] Add a section on how to override templates (basically a gentle introduction to `Jinja2`)

I took the freedom of bothering directly a first set of reviewers but really, anybody feel free to comment!
title: SC17: reworked module file tutorial section
